actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Capital Planning Act of 1952.

summary.text: Includes Charles County, Maryland within the National Capital region for purposes of comprehensive planning relating to the location of Federal agencies. Requires that specified proposed leases within the National Capital region by executive departments and agencies or by the United States Postal Service Service be submitted to the National Capital Planning Commission to vote any such proposed lease.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Capital Planning Act of 1952.
